name: reusng
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wreu(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wreu(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
